smallbuildtweaks.gui.config.title: Small Build Tweaks v%s Config Menu
smallbuildtweaks.common.gui.config.keybi:
- Left click to configure
- Right click to reset to defaults
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.relo: Reload rule.*.txt files in config folder
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.sort: The sorting method used for inventory sorting
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.cust: The rule for custom sorting method
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.incl: Hold this key to include hotbar
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.move: Hold this key to move/throw all
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.alwa: Include hotbar without holding the modifier key (then holding the modifier key is to exclude hotbar)
Move all without holding the modifier key (then holding the modifier key is to move matching items only)
Throw all without holding the modifier key (then holding the modifier key is to throw matching items only)
smallbuildtweaks.config.name.profiles_pe: Enable Different Profile set per server/world
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.enab:
Enables profiles support.
Profiles are sets of gear you can switch between with a single button.
If you wanna learn how to setup the Profile Support go to the "Edit Profiles" page.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.prof: If set to true you will have different set of profiles for every server you connect to.
smallbuildtweaks.config.name.enable_lock: Enable Unique Locked Slots per World/Server
smallbuildtweaks.config.name.locked_slot: Disable SHIFT click/Ctrl+Q/Q for locked slots
Enable picking items into empty locked slots
Ticks to wait on dimension change
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.enab: Locked slots are ignored for: sort, move all, clean cursor, continuous crafting supplies storage, auto refill supplies storage (auto refill monitoring slots are not affected). Notice that groups in columns/rows only works if the shape of remaining non-locked slots is rectangular.

If enabled every server and uniquely named world will have their own locked slots
Notice:
1. If you tend to name all your worlds "New World" they will all share the same locked slots.
2. Servers behind bungeecord/velocity proxies will share locked slots.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.lock: Config lock slots by "Config Key" while holding this key (Default Alt + Left Click to config lock slots)
Config lock slots while holding modifier key (Default Alt + Left Click to config lock slots)
Config lock slots without holding modifier key
Quick disable lock slots when this key is being held down
Set config switch type to toggle or hold
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.show:
Draw locked slots background
(You can create your own texture from

resourcepacks/§o[pack_name]§r/assets/smallbuildtweaksnext/textures/gui/overlay.png)

Draw locked slots foreground
(You can create your own texture from

resourcepacks/§o[pack_name]§r/assets/smallbuildtweaksnext/textures/gui/overlay.png)
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.lock:
Select foreground style from preset
(You can create your own texture from

resourcepacks/§o[pack_name]§r/assets/smallbuildtweaksnext/textures/gui/overlay.png)

Locked slots will be immune to:
 - Shift+click
 - Ctrl+Q
 - Swipe Shift+click
Swipe Ctrl+Q

Should it be possible to pick items from the ground into EMPTY locked slots.
Stackable items will still be picked into locked sots of the same item that have room.
NOTE: See next setting description for more information!

The number of client ticks to wait before reinitialising the Locked Slot Keeper on word/dimension change.
If locked slots get items moved out/thrown away on dimension change you need to increase this value.
This often happens on servers under heavy load.
NOTE: 20 ticks are equivalent onf 1 second.
§l§cWARNING§r: Setting this too high MAY lead to locked slot management not working properly until this timeout expires.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.enab: Refill the item in your hand when they have ran out
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.disa: Disable Auto Refill for drop item
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.refi: Refill the item in armor slots when they have broken
Refill tool/armor before durability is empty (threshold value by "Tool Damage Threshold")
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.tool: When durability below this value (Absolute or %%), refill the item.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.thre: Set the unit for "Tool Damage Threshold" (Absolute Value or Percentage (%%))
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.auto: Wait n ticks after the item ran out, then do the auto refill. Might be useful on some laggy servers.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.add_: Adds some interval between clicks while sorting. Amount of interval can be set by "intervalBetweenClicksMs". Might be useful on some laggy servers or inventory.fastclick disabled servers. (To bypass some servers, 67 ms is recommended)
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.inte: Interval between clicks. In milliseconds. (To bypass some servers, 67 ms is recommended)
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.rest: Auto restock your hotbar while sorting
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.sort: When this is true, using hotkey sorting will sort the slots that curosr is pointing to. Otherwise it will always sort the container.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.move: When curosr is pointing container, "Move All" hotkey move from container to player. Otherwise it will always move from player to container.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.stop: Stop sorting (when "Add Interval Between Clicks" enabled) if inventory screen is closed
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.enab:
This enables small 3 button user interface under the player inventory screen that can be used to switch between profiles and apply the currently active one.
All of the UI functions are available as shortcuts too
smallbuildtweaks.config.name.treat_unkno: Add inventory buttons to all in game screens
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.enab: Set this to enable or disable all additional widgets for container screen
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.trea:
This is mostly for compatibility with other mods that have introduce screens which are not real inventory.
Setting this to false will disable the inserting of widgets for all but vanilla screens.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.show:
Show continuous crafting checkbox on GUI (crafting table & survival inventory)
Continuous Crafting: Auto refill the ingredient slots
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.cont: Remember the checkbox value or set it next time of opening screen
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.show: Show regular sort button on GUI
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.regu: Set the post action for regular sort button
Set the sort order for regular sort button
Set the custom rule for regular sort button
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.show: Show sort in columns button on GUI
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.in_c: Set the post action for sort in columns button
Set the sort order for sort in columns button
Set the custom rule for sort in columns button
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.show: Show sort in rows button on GUI
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.in_r: Set the post action for sort in rows button
Set the sort order for sort in rows button
Set the custom rule for sort in rows button
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.show: Show move all buttons on GUI
Display tooltips when cursor hover the buttons on GUI
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.use_: v0.4.2+ use new method to insert widgets to a screen for better mod compatibility. Set this to true to revert to old method.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.quic: The name of the Profile that will be accessible with Quick Profile 1 hot key.
The name of the Profile that will be accessible with Quick Profile 2 hot key.
The name of the Profile that will be accessible with Quick Profile 3 hot key.
smallbuildtweaks.config.name.save_as_pro: Save the current state as "Saved" Profile
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.save:
This hotkey saves the current equipment set as a Profile named "Saved".
You can use the Saved profiles to build your own profiles.

§l§cNOTE§r:
EVERY TIME you press it a new Profile named "Saved" is created.
The "Saved" profiles will not be part of the next/previous rotation and cannot be assigned to Quick Profiles.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.next: Hotkey for changing to the next profile
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.prev: Hotkey for changing to the previous profile
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.prof:
Hotkey for changing to Quick Profile 1.
You can configure the Quick Profiles in the Edit Profiles config page.

Hotkey for changing to Quick Profile 2.
You can configure the Quick Profiles in the Edit Profiles config page.

Hotkey for changing to Quick Profile 3.
You can configure the Quick Profiles in the Edit Profiles config page.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.open: The key open the in-game config GUI
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.sort: The key to sort the inventory
The key to sort the inventory in columns
The key to sort the inventory in rows
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.move: The key to move all the items that already existed in the container
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.thro:
The key to throw all items for either player inventory or the opened container.Generally useful for mass crafting.
All modifier keys for Move All Items apply here too.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.dump: Prints the item string with nbt to the chat
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.relo:
This hotkey can be used for faster config reloading when you are defining new custom rules.
In ANY other case it's recommended to keep it unset.
Reloading the configurations is not something you want to do often.
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.prev: Closing GUI will no longer drop the item that holding by the cursor
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.cont: Allows you to move items for the slots under the cursor while holding shift and left click
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.swip: Enable "Swipe Moving Items" in crafting result slot
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.inst: Adds breaking delay to the blocks that you can instantly mine. This option has lower priority than "disableBlockBreakingCooldown".
smallbuildtweaks.config.description.disa: Removes breaking delay for all blocks
Removes use key cooldown so you can have equivalently 1 right click every game tick. Can use along with Tweakeroo "tweakPlacementRestriction".
Receiving damage no longer shakes your screen
Allows you to have a clearer view underneath lava
